changelog: Feature: Group pickup stats by break time on Vendor Pickup Stats page
Feature: Group shift stats by break time on Admin Dashboard
Feature: Group shifts by break time on Weekly Menu page
Feature: Menu per break time saves to all shifts automatically
Feature: Group menus by break time on Lihat Menu page
Feature: Larger menu images with lightbox preview on Weekly Menu
UI: Renamed labels to 'Waktu Istirahat' across all pages
